entry.title: tolerance set for supplier invoice amounts
entry.content:
I have a 5% tolerance set for supplier invoice amounts, but if I enter an amount that exceeds 5%, no error occurs.

Could you tell me how to make it so that an error occurs?

entry.title: Unable to Get Sales Order number which are failed in Schedule Delivery Creation JOB
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We are unable to get the Sales order number which are failed with reason in schedule delivery creation JOB. Is their any standard report or shall we create any customize report of the Sales order number with reason of failed.

How we can achieve this .

Thanks,

Dinesh Sahoo

entry.title: How to add output tax line item in customer master data
entry.content:
Dear colleague,

I need add one line item in customer master data for country CN and tax condition type ZTX1

I have created the condition type ZTX1 copied from TTX1 via SSCUI 101120

And I also configure the SSCUI: 106589 Maintain Tax Relevance for Customers

But still can't edit in customer master data, what else did I miss...could you help to support it?

Many thanks,

Chen

entry.title: Does S/4 HANA not have the BUZID ?
entry.content:
Hello experts,

Does ACDOCA not have the BSEG-BUZID ?
I can't find BUZID in "line items in G/L"...

entry.title: FI_OT_DNC001 message
entry.content:
Hi,

when I enter a posting date later than today's date, I get the message FI_OT_DNC001, which I've attached. However, it doesn't appear on another customer, and I'd like this message to appear for that customer as well. How can I do this?

Thanks.

entry.title: New MRP Controller values invisible on Planned Orders apps
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I have created specific MRP Controllers in the system.

I can assign them to Materials in the Plant node, for planning purpose.

However, when using apps related to Planned Orders such as Manage Planned Orders or Convert Planned Orders, I can only see in the filter the SAP standard Values :

Also, Planned Orders (that do exist) are no listed either which is even more annoying.

Only the Collective Conversion app will let me see them.

Anything I might have missed in the configuration or is it a system issue?

Many thanks for your insights.

entry.title: S/4 Hana public cloud - Key User - Create Custom Tile with Custom CDS view
entry.content:
Hi all,

I need to create a custom Tile using my custom CDS created in Key user mode using the app Custom Cds View.

I found a temporary solution, create tile using the URL of Custom data browser for my CDS, but it's not dynamic  ( DEV, TEST, PROD) for each system.

There is a correct procedure to expose my CDS view using a Custom Tile?

thanks,

entry.title: IT_VAT_REGISTER report
entry.content:
Hi,

 

In the “Manage your solution” App, I see IT_VAT_REGISTER report,

but in the “Run Statutory Reports”, I see only IT_VAT_DCL report.

How I can do for show also the IT_VAT_REGISTER report?


Thanks

When I enter a posting date later than today's date, I get the message FI_OT_DNC001, which I've attached. However, it doesn't appear on another customer, and I'd like this message to appear for that customer as well. How can I do this?

entry.title: How to configure automatic G/L account selection for outgoing payments in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud,
entry.content:
When posting outgoing or incoming payments, after i choose bank account, there's the option to also select the GL account. Kindly find attached the screenshot. How do i configure the system to automatically choose outgoing payment GL when its an outgoing payment and incoming payment GL when its an incoming payment. I dont want to have to manually input this when creating payment.

Please note that i have created the reconciliation GL and have maintained the two subaccounts. I have also connected the reconciliation GL to the bank account.

entry.title: Document type NB is not valid for Purchasing Group XX.”
entry.content:
Hello experts,

 

I am working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I am facing an issue while creating a Purchase Requisition based on a free-text item (no material master).

 

When I select my Purchasing Group “XX”, the system shows the following error message:

“Document type NB is not valid for Purchasing Group XX.”

 

I would like to understand:

1. Where this validation is maintained in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

2. In which SSCUI or configuration step can I authorize a Purchasing Group to be used with document type NB?

3. Is there any dependency or restriction between PR document type and Purchasing Group in the standard setup?

 

Any guidance, screenshots, or SAP Notes would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

entry.title: Configuration currently locked in "Manage G/L Account Master Data" App
entry.content:
Hi,

we are experiencing a critical lock on configuration object editing in our Development system (DEV).

I need to make some change to the accounts, but the system don't allow to make change and show the message on the screen. The other TR related to the chart of accounts is on quality environment. How can I make change to the accounts and transport the TR on quality environment?

 

Thanks

entry.title: What does "Price Category HF" mean?
entry.content:
Hello.

I would like to know the meaning of the item "Price Category HF" in the "BCPricingChanges" sheet in the file "Delta_S4CE_2502_2408_final_SAPNote.xlsx" attached to SAP note 3533745 (https://me.sap.com/notes/3533745).
What does this item "Price Category HF" mean?
Is it a notice of future price category changes?

Thanks and Regards
--
Masahiro Nagao

entry.title: Output tax field in the customer master.
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have a question about output tax field in the customer master.

This is our partner system, I want to add another Dep City/Reg for tax determination for customer side.
(For example, Dep City/Reg in US)

But I can't find which data affects this field in the SAP Public Cloud system.

Kindly explain what do I need to do add new country column in the output tax field in the customer master?

Best Regards,
